# Dorahairstylist Portfolio

This is a React portfolio website for Dorahairstylist salon built with Vite and Tailwind CSS.

## Project Details
- **Framework**: React 18 with Vite
- **Styling**: Tailwind CSS
- **Design Style**: Clean, minimalist gallery-style layout inspired by portfolio websites
- **Features**: Responsive design, image gallery, contact section

## Development Guidelines
- Use functional components with React Hooks
- Follow Tailwind CSS utility-first approach
- Maintain mobile-first responsive design
- Keep components modular and reusable
